Pre-Game Insights: Canada's Aaron Johnson believes the tricky wicket will level the playing field for them against Pakistan.
Johnson thinks Pakistan's skilled players will be affected by the wicket's tricky conditions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada will draw level with the top two teams from Group A, India and USA, at four points if they win against Pakistan.
Others: The match between Canada and Pakistan will take place at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium on June 11, 2024.
Pakistan's loss would eliminate them from the tournament if they lose against Canada.
